channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - rst

item.title: Slowly converting from GuideXML to HTML
item.description: Gentoo has removed its support of the older GuideXML format in favor of using the Gentoo Wiki and a new content management system for the main site (or is it static pages, I don't have the faintest idea to be honest). I do still have a few GuideXML pages in â€¦
